properties.name: food-map-api.jwtauth.token.secret
properties.description: The secret used to encode the JWT tokens.

properties.name: food-map-api.jwtauth.token.expiration
properties.description: The duration in milliseconds that the token is valid for.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.not-found-by-username
properties.description: Error message when the Account cannot be found by username.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.not-found-by-role-value
properties.description: Error message when the Role cannot be found by value.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.not-found-by-line-code
properties.description: Error message when the Metro Line cannot be found by line code.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.not-found-by-stationID
properties.description: Error message when the Metro Station cannot be found by stationID.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.not-found-by-station-code
properties.description: Error message when the Metro Station cannot be found by station code.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.not-found-by-restaurantID
properties.description: Error message when the Restaurant cannot be found by restaurantID.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.invalid-username
properties.description: Error message when the user sent an invalid username.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.invalid-email
properties.description: Error message when the user sent an invalid email.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.missing-password
properties.description: Error message when the user sent a missing password.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.taken-username
properties.description: Error message when the user sent an username that is already used by another account.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.taken-email
properties.description: Error message when the user sent an email that is already used by another account.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.bad-credentials
properties.description: Error message when the user provides a bad username or password.

properties.name: food-map-api.error-messages.failed-authentication
properties.description: Error message when the authentication of the user failed.
